minisun se ma satha sipawatath jiwathwima tharjanayata lak wi athi bawa da pawasu amathiwaraya ada shri lankika shishtacharaya ha saradharmayangen paripurna ratak bawata pathwemin pawathina bawa da kiya.lekhawus karthru mandala adhyaksha silarathna senarath mahathahathalis atawana waratath pawathwana poson maha aaloka pujawata sahabhagiwimata labima maha bhagyayak.ape shishtacharayath sanskruthiyath sabhyathwayath sadacharayath uruma kala mihinthala punya bhumiye abalan wi pawathina rajamaha wiharasthana ‘pohoya geya’ labana poson pohoyata pera lekhawus aayathanaya wisin prathisanskaranaya kara sambuddha sasanayata puja karana bawa kiweya.sama poson pohoyakatama mihinthala aaloka pujawa sidukarana lekhawus aayathanaya pasalwalata udaw upakara kala bawath gammanawalata widuli balaya laba dimata da katayuthu kara athi bawath penwa dunneya.mihinthala wiharadhikari walawahanguwawawe dhammarathana himiyo anushasanawak kalaha.me awasthawata widuli bala ha balashakthi niyojya amathya premalal jayasekara, anuradhapura maha disapathi ech.em.ke. herath, lekhawus meheyum adhyaksha upul disanayaka, nithi adhyaksha nithignya rasanga harischandra, samanyadhikari abhaya amaradasa mahathwaru athulu lekhawus aayathanaye niladharihu rasak sahabhagi wuha.(thennakon kulasekara, chula bandara kulasekara, gamini jayasinha, kithsiri wanasinha, gayan rajapaksha amila prabhath wanasinha samanga sanjiwa sampath gunathilaka nachchaduwa samuha)

pasugiya wasare mul masa haya ha sasandimedi meya 4.8 %ka wardhanayak yayida ema adhikariya sandahan karayi.ikuth wasare palamu masa haya thula meratata pamini sancharakayin sankhyawa nawa laksha hatahathara dahas desiya hatahathaki (964 267).

mulinma ....aarts digri walata job na kiyala godak mantal dayal kiyaddith ee lewal walata aarts karala kampasnuth gihin digrigaththu unnata men ape hatsuth oof.bat man ankalge gon katha nommara eka,wishwawidyala upadiyak job kattakata uunanaya kirima ( dan oya kiyayi man ehema kiwewe nane kiyala, apahu oyagema koment eka kiyawanna )bat man ankalge gon katha nommara deka, aanduwen rakiya illana rakiya wirahitha upadhidarin siyallakma kala upadhi darin yayi kima bat man ankalge gon katha nommara thuna,kala upadhidarinta rikiya nathayi kimabat man ankalge gon katha nommara hathara,wishwawidyala upadi kala, widya, wanija lesa wenkaran gal yugaye thawamath sitima ( pramukha wishwawidyala kipayaka patamala sanyojanayan kiyawa balanna)bat man ankalge gon katha nommara paha,upadhidari wirakiyawa pudgala kendriya gataluwak bawa imathu kirima, purawasiyan ge wirakiyawata piliyam sewime aanduwe wagakimen aanduwa iwath kirima //meka aats kirimata wiruddhawa nowa aats kara nam aanduwe rassa diya yuthu yayi sithimata...////sarana somalatha subasinha alla ganna epa//oyane ankal natta pagan thiyene.
